author: Ian Allison
title: Healthcare Firm Prenetics Uses Kraken to Kickoff Bitcoin Treasury
description: Prenetics purchased 187.42 BTC at an average price of $106,712 per Bitcoin via a Kraken custody account.
content: Prenetics Global Limited (NASDAQ: PRE) is the latest firm in the healthcare space to copy MicroStrategys $40 billion bitcoin treasury strategy, having acquired its first $20 million BTC investment, w… [+1274 chars]
